description.value:
Trigger You begin to Cast a Spell that requires at least 2 actions to cast.

You instantly tap into the magical power of a spell you're casting to quickly pounce around the battlefield. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Step], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Leap], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Stand]. This action can be before or after you Cast the Spell.
